HomePage.welcomeTextDescription: Websites built with technologies fresher than a batch of fresh donuts.
HomePage.name: Pawel Wessel

projects.name: Blackbell Studio
projects.shortDescription: Online shop with artworks from Blackbell Studio.

projects.name: Hexon.work
projects.shortDescription: Website with a dedicated CRM system for the energy industry.

timeline.title: IT school
timeline.description: Began studying computer science at a technical high school

timeline.title: First Website
timeline.description: In 2017 I created my first primitive website using HTML, CSS and JavaScript

timeline.title: Focus on PHP
timeline.description: After passing my exams, I Focused on PHP and created my first project, which included a payment system.

timeline.title: Learning React
timeline.description: I decided to explore coding further, concentrating on a JavaScript library - React.

timeline.title: Encounter with Mentor
timeline.description: Met my mentor, an experienced professional who reviewed my code and presented exciting challenges.

timeline.title: Creating projects
timeline.description: This year was a big step forward. I've learned a lot and created a collection of projects.

HomePage.logicDesc: I like to work with the logic of applications and optimization. Designing and implementing new features excites me, and I am constantly driven to innovate.
HomePage.learningDesc: My passion for programming fuels my desire for continuous growth, and I actively pursue opportunities to learn.
HomePage.visualizationDesc: I find it satisfying to work with data that I can visualize. Observing the flow of information between the components I create is a source of great fascination for me.
HomePage.storyDesc: When I used to look at games or web applications, I often wondered, 'How is this made? Is it difficult to achieve?' I always wanted to find the answers to these questions. While working at the warehouse, I had a desire to grow, so after work, I would fire up my development environment and tinker with code, exploring newer technologies and solutions
HomePage.plan1: Learning to utilize different programming languages and staying updated with technologies I use.
HomePage.plan2: Exploring the field of game development in my free time.
HomePage.plan3: Pursuing interests beyond programming, such as improving my drawing skills and mastering communication in the Dutch language.
